title: I've been... hacked???
body:
I was playing lastnight on my OCE account titled Lil Titties. I finished a game and all of a sudden it said someone has logged in on my account from somewhere else and I know for a fact i dont give or have ever given my password out ever. It has to have been hacked and I know that, some random from a game added me just to tell me how bad I was at the game and Ive never seen someone rage at something so little before and  he said he was a smurf and he wants to keep me on his list for no apparent reason at all. I truly believe it would have been him/her, there name was DuckHeWhoKites
Please solve this asap, I've put alot of blood, sweat and tears to this account even abit of money. I don't want all of this to be for nothing....
P.s I also went on this account to see if I was still online and there is no name Lil Titties and I assume everyone on that account has been delted.

Thanks!

replies.body:
I'm also a victim of hacking, my account was suspended recently.
Change your passwords on everything related to your LoL account. Those hackers are mostly likely using your account as a guinea pig to test out scripts, only a matter of time before your account gets banned/suspended. And Riot Support won't do anything about it.
i have the same problem and my email has been changed i cant put in a request because it requires so much detail that most people wouldn't bother remembering
